conversations.content: How many appointments do I have today?

<function_thought>
To determine how many appointments Emma has today, I first need to get the current day. This will help me retrieve the list of appointments for that specific day. Therefore, I will call the `get_current_day` function first, followed by the `get_day_calendar_events` function using the current date obtained from the first call.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_current_day()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The current date is obtained as May 15, 2024. Next, I will use this date to retrieve the appointments for today by calling the `get_day_calendar_events` function with the date "2024-05-15".
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_day_calendar_events(day="2024-05-15")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
